updates.title: Initial Release
updates.description: Replix Loader v1.0 released with KeyAuth integration, product access, and security features.

updates.title: UI Enhancements
updates.description: Improved notification system, added announcements page, and fixed progress bar width.

updates.title: FiveM External Updates
updates.description: Added new external features and improved compatibility with latest FiveM versions.

updates.title: Profile Data Fix
updates.description: Fixed profile tab not showing correct user information and date formatting issues.

updates.title: Dynamic Updates System
updates.description: Implemented dynamic updates system that fetches announcements from GitHub raw URL for easy management.
